## Overview Tab {.tabset}
```{r NEAFCoverview, include=FALSE}
  neafc_mxt <- st_bbox(NEAFCReg)
  nam <- c("NEAFC regulatory areas")
# 
  neafc_mfs <- leaflet() %>%
    fitBounds(neafc_mxt[[1]],neafc_mxt[[2]],neafc_mxt[[3]],neafc_mxt[[4]]) %>%
    addProviderTiles(providers$Esri.WorldImagery)%>%
   # boundaries
    addPolygons(data = NEAFCReg, group = nam[1],
                stroke = TRUE, fillOpacity = 0, smoothFactor = 0.5, opacity = 0.5, weight = 1, color = "white")
```
